casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Paul Dewayne CUMMINGS. No. 1A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 7, 2005. William N. Farrell, Jr., Senior Deputy Attorney General, John Carriker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 6th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time for Court Reporter to Prepare the Transcript:

"Motion Allowed. Court reporter shall have up to and including the 6th day of May 2005 to prepare and deliver transcript *28to counsel. By order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of April 2005."
